<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Haughty Obstinacy](/Feats.aspx?ID=69) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 57 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your powerful ego makes it harder for others to order you around. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect that attempts to directly control your actions, you critically succeed instead. If a creature rolls a failure on a check to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52) you using [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), it gets a critical failure instead (so it can't try to Coerce you again for 1 week).
name: Haughty Obstinacy
